name: SliverSrc - The Unleashed Hell Grimoire
description:
Just an rpg maker game, the plot is is basically, back in 2004 there was a rather trouble-some demon in hell that needed to be sealed off... but the sealer wasn't the best causing a large part of hell to get sealed off aswell. now around 13 years rather, A tall blonde hair girl has the grimoire that has half of hell sealed in it and she manages to take it off by tossing it at the wall of her room

Known bugs: There are transports that dont work without hitting z on them

credits:

Shoutout to

effects that I used for the M9 and shotgun. Even tho
the second one came from a sound effects libary

Aaron Krogh for his free to use soundtrack
